articles.title: Astronaut James McDivitt, who led Gemini and Apollo missions, has died at 93 - Gwinnettdailypost.com
articles.description: James McDivitt, a former NASA astronaut who commanded the Gemini IV and Apollo 9 missions, died in his sleep last week in Tucson, Arizona, NASA said in a statement Monday.
